pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video shows a scenic view of a wide, flowing river with some rapids. The river is flanked by stony banks, with a line of green trees on one side and a larger, tree-covered hill in the distance under a blue sky with white clouds. The camera slowly moves forward and slightly upwards, offering an aerial perspective of the landscape.
